price: To je objašnjenje ljudima, i uputa i pouka za one koji se Allaha boje.
arabic: هَٰذَا بَيَانٞ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā bayānun lilnnāsi wahudan wamawʿiẓatun lil'muttaqīna
